named-query.name: Ferments.brewing
named-query.query: from Ferment f where current_timestamp() between f.start and f.stop

named-query.name: Containers.available
named-query.query: from Container c where c.ferment is null order by c.volume

named-query.name: Containers.pick
named-query.query: from Container c where c.ferment is null and c.volume >= :minimum order by c.volume
